registryList %>%

                                             c(10,25,50,"All")),
                           autoWidth = TRUE,
                           columnDefs = list(list(width = '200px', targets = c(1)),
                                        list(width = '100px', targets = c(2,3)),

                           initComplete = JS("
                        function(settings, json) {
                          $(this.api().table().header()).css({
                          'font-size': '12px',
                          });
                        }
                        ")
                  ),escape = FALSE) %>%
                    formatStyle(columns = colnames(.$x$data), `font-size` = "9px")
